subject: Advertising and Marketing
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jon Hamm of “Mad Men” directed Clint Dempsey, the United States national soccer team captain, in a short promotional film for a deodorant.
snippet: Jon Hamm of “Mad Men” directed Clint Dempsey, the United States national soccer team captain, in a short promotional film for a deodorant.
